thread.title: Christine
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Christine

author: Christine
title: Christine
text: It was my first day in Texas coming from Washington and I met Sam at Home Zone. She was amazing. As stressful as my move was, she made it so easy to start my new home. I has a million questions and she had a million options for me. She was very knowledgeable in the products she was selling and she put forth the best customer service I've had the pleasure of experiencing. I will definitely be back to see her soon!
